instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message:
hello Guys,
so i have here an Macbook pro 2019, it does not power on but the trackpad can be clicked one time not with force touch but just soft click.

it takes 20.1V and 0.14A from the charger the board looks like new there is no any corrosion,these are the measurements i have done

PP3V3_G3H_RTC= 3.3V

PP1V8_SLPS2R=1.8V

PPVDDCPU_AWAKE= 0.75V

PP1V2_AWAKE 1.2V

PMU_SYS_ALIVE= 1.78V

PMU_COLD_RESET_L= 1.79V

PP5V_G3S = 5V

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message:
If all SLPS2R and AWAKE voltages are present, see what happens in DFU mode.
Try Revive option first; it will not erase SSD.

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message:
Is it possible to to it without an additional macbook? I have only windows pc.
Thanks

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message: You need another MacBook, with Apple Configurator 2 installed.

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message:
I have tried to run it on my windows pc with virtual machine running mac os but the apple configurator 2 doesnt show the connected macbook in dfu mode.
I thought that the macbook took only 0.14amps but it increases slowly up to 2.6A  when i leave  the charger in.

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message: I get this error message when trying to restore it

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message:
Did you exactly follow this tutorial?
Try another cable, just in case.

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message:
Yes the apple configurator detects the macbook it shows up a device in DFU mode,
But then i get this message,i have tried 2 working cables

threads.message: What the client said about failure history?

threads.title: 820-01598 2019 no power
threads.message:
It just suddenly stopped working, no waterdamage,…
This is what i get after the revive process stops, also the fan starts to spin for few seconds

threads.message:
Looks like device is locked.
Same thing happens wirh restore option?
